SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Diplomat0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. May [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] silver tongue live on forever. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesAncestors_FamilyFirst0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Nothing was dearer to [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] than family. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_August0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. The world is a humbler place without [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] august personage. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Hunter0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Ne'er a truer shot in the land. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] brain moved faster than any foe could predict. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Gallant0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. A nobler soul has never lived. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] buildings and monuments will outlast us all. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Administrator0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Nothing breathed in [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] domain without [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] knowing about it. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Avaricious0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Nothing motivated [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] quite so much as the clink of silver against silver. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Schemer0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. The twists and turns of [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] mind knotted even the best of spies. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] broke too many hearts to count. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Torturer0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. The world is glad to be rid of [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] nightmarish ministrations. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] words and wisdom will live for eternity. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] was dearer to [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] than any other mortal alive. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Mystic0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. May [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] find rest beyond the veil [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] crossed so often. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] wise treatments saved countless numbers. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] took the secret of [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] favorite mushroom patch to the grave. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] lust is finally slaked. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] never needs worry against about the temptations of the flesh. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Gluttonous0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Not once in [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetAge] did [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] skip a meal. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Greedy0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. May [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] find the wealth in death that [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] craved in life. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] is remembered for [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] generosity with coin. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] would sometimes do nothing for literally years at a time. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] always said [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] could rest when [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] died. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Wrathful0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. No one threw a surprise punch quite as well as [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim]. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] was an ocean of calm. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] no longer has any time left to bide. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] rush to go places has finally stopped. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Arrogant0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. No one ever falsely accused [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] of lacking self-worth. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] was as meek as a mouse. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U]'ll never tell another lie. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] told not one falsehood from cradle to grave. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] ran from many things, but no [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] can outrun death. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] stood against all foes with courage, even death. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Shy0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Though seen by few as-was, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] like will never be seen again. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] many friends will miss [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] forever. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] ambition knew no bounds save one. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Content0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Whatever else [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] may have been, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] died content. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Arbitrary0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. May the laws of [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetFaith.DeathDeityName] treat [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] better than [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] treated the laws of the living. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] obeyed the law to a fault. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

U] never believed in [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetFaith.PositiveAfterLife], and surely resides in [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetFaith.NegativeAfterLife]. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] was a [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] of intense, overwhelming faith. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] saw enemies everywhere, but couldn't stave off the inevitable. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Trusting0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Never suspicious, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] always thought the best of everyone. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Compassionate0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. May history be as kind to [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] as [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] was to others. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Callous0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. In life, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] cared nothing for the feelings of others, and in death, none care for [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis]. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] preyed on [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] fellow man with ruthless glee. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Stubborn0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. A [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] of resolution, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] refused to change [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] mind for anyone. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Fickle0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. All knew that [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] opinion blew with the winds. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Vengeful0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. No one held a grudge like [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim]. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Forgiving0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. A [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] of infinite love, there was no grudge [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] could not find it in [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerselfHimself] to forgive. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Drunkard0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. For better or for worse, few could drink [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] under the table. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Hashishiyah0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Of a relaxed mind, little troubled [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] while [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] had access to [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] cake stash. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] was a preferred client at a number of venerable establishments. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Reclusive0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Some claim [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] did not exist, but a rare few attest to have seen [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim]. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Irritable0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. A [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] of short temper, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] was well described as a candle burning at both ends. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] endurance was confusing and inspiring. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] charity was legendary, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] financial planning less so. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Contrite0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. Though [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] tongue was loose, [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] conscience was spotless. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] had a taste for many things. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Inappetetic0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. We hope she finds comfort in [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetFaith.PositiveAfterLife] that [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetSheHe] lacked on Earth. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Journaller0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. What else is there to be written about [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim]? $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] was never afraid to ask for support. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] always said there was nothing a good run couldn't solve. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] restored the Light, and for that we are ever thankful. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] rage was as primal as the winds of a storm. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] was the favorite of the $greek$ King. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] swung [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] words as skillfully as any sword. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Kinslayer0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. For all [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] other deeds, we must still label [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHim] kinslayer. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] taste was eclectic. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] welcomed any and all exotic strangers to [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] court. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] was known for [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] dedication to family. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] let nothing stop [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] goals. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] name was feared by every peasant who ever heard it. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Reincarnation0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. This was not [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] first time on this Earth, and will not be [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] last. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column2: U] roamed further and faster than any other. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] faith burned white-hot. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] came from the humblest of origins. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] was a [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] of strange powers. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] fought the infidel all [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] life. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
U] was the axle at the Center of the World. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

column1: SteleCommemoratesAncestors_GreatestOfKhans0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. All the world trembled at [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] footsteps and by [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetHerHis] will. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Paragon0:"$SteleCommemoratesAncestors_Intro$. We may never again see another [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetWomanMan] as pious. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesConquest_Intro0:"Raised for [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_commissioner').Char.GetTitledFirstNameNicknamed] to mark [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_commissioner').Char.GetHerHis] victory over [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Char.GetTitledFirstNameNicknamed]"
SteleCommemoratesConquest_Bloody0:"$SteleCommemoratesConquest_Intro$. The war was one of history's bloodiest. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesConquest_Glorious0:"$SteleCommemoratesConquest_Intro$. The conquest was a glorious one. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesConquest_HardFought0:"$SteleCommemoratesConquest_Intro$. The war was harder fought than any other. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesConquest_OftForgotten0:"$SteleCommemoratesConquest_Intro$. This war, despite its importance, is oft-forgotten. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesPromotion_Intro0:"Raised for [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_commissioner').Char.GetTitledFirstNameNicknamed] to mark [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_commissioner').Char.GetHerHis] succession to the throne of [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_container').Title.GetNameNoTier]"
SteleCommemoratesPromotion_TrulyWorthy0:"$SteleCommemoratesPromotion_Intro$. Only [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_commissioner').Char.GetSheHe] was truly worthy to rule. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."

SteleCommemoratesPromotion_Magnificent0:"$SteleCommemoratesPromotion_Intro$. May [second.MakeScope.Var('stele_commissioner').Char.GetHerHis] magnificent reign last for a century. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
SteleCommemoratesPromotion_AweInspiring0:"$SteleCommemoratesPromotion_Intro$. The ceremony inspired awe in all. $SteleCommemoratesCarver$."
